mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Web.Html.Meta.OpenGraphProtocol
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Adds the Open Graph Protocol meta tags to a page, which allows its integration into the Facebook's social graph.
mi:PackageInformation.TechicalDetails: Adds the Open Graph Protocol meta tags to a page, which allows its integration into the Facebook's social graph.
